channel.title: The Powerless Rise on
channel.description: Recent content in The Powerless Rise on

item.title: Anger and Apathy
item.description: [[songs/n/neffex/fight_back__the_collection/make_it.md#and-i-know-that-they-all-wanna-hate-me-vyl-wnanory|I’ve tried to find reconciliation behind the walls of those whose hatred burns.]] [[songs/n/neffex/fight_back__the_collection/make_it.md#and-i-know-that-they-all-wanna-hate-me-vyl-wnanory|For I find it easier to reach someone who still feels,]] [[songs/n/neffex/fight_back__the_collection/make_it.

item.title: Anodyne Sea
item.description: [[songs/e/eminem/the_marshall_mathers_lp_2/rap_god.md#look-i-was-gonna-go-easy-on-you-not-to-hurt-your-feelings-vyl-wnanory|None of this matters, none of these words. Common and silent we will die in this world.]] [[songs/e/eminem/the_marshall_mathers_lp_2/rap_god.md#look-i-was-gonna-go-easy-on-you-not-to-hurt-your-feelings-vyl-wnanory|We’ve only spoken to those who agree, and without them we’ve fallen on deaf ears.

item.title: Beyond Our Suffering
item.description: [[songs/d/dead_when_i_found_her/rag_doll_blues/mirrors.md#and-you-only-believe-what-you-can-see-vyl-wnanory|What we see now is only a fraction]] [[songs/s/sum_41/does_this_look_infected/over_my_head_better_off_dead.md#now-im-in-vyl-wnanory|Bound to learn the hard way]] [[songs/s/sum_41/does_this_look_infected/over_my_head_better_off_dead.md#now-im-in-vyl-wnanory|This is the human condition]] [[songs/s/sum_41/does_this_look_infected/over_my_head_better_off_dead.

item.title: Condemned
item.description: [[songs/m/meredith_brooks/blurring_the_edges/bitch.md#im-a-bitch-im-a-tease-vyl-wnanory|Yaahh]] [[songs/m/meredith_brooks/blurring_the_edges/bitch.md#im-a-bitch-im-a-tease-vyl-wnanory|Condemned Condemned Condemned Condemned]] [[songs/m/meredith_brooks/blurring_the_edges/bitch.md#im-a-bitch-im-a-tease-vyl-wnanory|Condemned without given a chance to speak.]] [[songs/m/meredith_brooks/blurring_the_edges/bitch.md#im-a-bitch-im-a-tease-vyl-wnanory|Without acknowledgment they’re made less than human.]] [[songs/s/sister_machine_gun/metropolis/torque.

item.title: Parallels
item.description: [[songs/c/curve/doppelgänger/already_yours.md#in-fact-i-never-wanted-anything-more-vyl-wnanory|We are all comatose. We are overfed and under undernourished, yearning for something more.]] [[songs/c/curve/doppelgänger/already_yours.md#in-fact-i-never-wanted-anything-more-vyl-wnanory|Never starving yet never quite satisfied.

item.title: The Blinding of False Light
item.description: [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/it_aint_easy.md#it-aint-easy-vyl-wnanory|I see now, I see through the veil of expectation.]] [[songs/c/cypress_hill/stoned_raiders/it_aint_easy.md#it-aint-easy-vyl-wnanory|I see now, I see that conformity is betrayal.]] [[songs/s/slipknot/all_hope_is_gone/wherein_lies_continue.

item.title: The Only Constant is Change
item.description: [[songs/a/as_i_lay_dying/an_ocean_between_us/an_ocean_between_us.md#go-vyl-wnanory|The only constant is change. The only constant is change. Go]] [[songs/s/seether/karma__effect/because_of_me.md#here-she-comes-again-vyl-wnanory|The human heart is born without legs, sliding back and forth,]] [[songs/s/seether/karma__effect/because_of_me.

item.title: The Plague
item.description: [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/a_fever_you_cant_sweat_out/camisado.md#the-anesthetic-never-set-in-and-im-wondering-where-vyl-wnanory|Just like the spread of disease Ya Ya]] [[songs/p/panic_at_the_disco/a_fever_you_cant_sweat_out/camisado.md#the-anesthetic-never-set-in-and-im-wondering-where-vyl-wnanory|Debt and guilt or guilt and decree, the masters that we please.

item.title: Upside Down Kingdom
item.description: [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/the_document_speaks_for_itself.md#the-room-keeps-spinning-faster-im-drifting-off-to-sleep-vyl-wnanory|Many choose to find their hope in the thoughts of afterlife]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/the_document_speaks_for_itself.md#the-room-keeps-spinning-faster-im-drifting-off-to-sleep-vyl-wnanory|When there is none to be found right here before we die]] [[songs/a/a_day_to_remember/common_courtesy/the_document_speaks_for_itself.

item.title: Vacancy
item.description: [[songs/m/madball/nyhc/for_my_enemies.md#ive-been-waiting-a-long-time-to-give-you-a-piece-of-my-mind-vyl-wnanory|We live in slavery to a past we cannot escape, and I say it’s worth it to just start again again.

item.title: Without Conclusion
item.description: [[songs/c/curve/open_day_at_the_hate_fest/you_dont_know.md#yeah-yeah-yeah-yeah-vyl-wnanory|Yeah]] [[songs/t/the_used/the_used/bulimic.md#from-the-way-that-you-acted-to-the-way-that-i-felt-it-vyl-wnanory|If we chase acclaim in search for search for stature,]] [[songs/t/the_used/the_used/bulimic.md#from-the-way-that-you-acted-to-the-way-that-i-felt-it-vyl-wnanory|Then our status becomes a vacuum draining. Opulence is a myth for there is no final rest.
